articles.description: Former defender Patrice Evra says supporters who "bullied" Man Utd defender Harry Maguire "must feel ashamed of themselves now".
articles.content:
Patrice Evra says supporters who “bullied” Man Utd defender Harry Maguire “must feel ashamed of themselves now” after his solid performances for England at the World Cup.

articles.description: The Newcastle United No 9 is the right man to lead the England front line in their World Cup knockout clash with Senegal
articles.content:
Oh it would be controversial and would take great bravery, but I would drop Harry Kane for England's do-or-die World Cup match with Senegal and play Callum Wilson.
